title: Account Level 5?
body: I want to add a suggestion to one of the pages, i am level 30 but it says i am level 5? Is this a glitch or is the board profile separate from league level?

replies.body:
Sometimes if you haven't used the boards in a long while, your Summoner profile will not have synced with it in a while. It seems your post here has forced a resync and resolved the issue.

Happy posting! ^.^
